name: Betrayal Of Order
description:
In Betrayal Of Order you follow the journey of Benjamin Canmore.

The kingdom has been overrun by the corrupted king and his army. You were exiled for 5 years after causing the death of a innocent man during the corruption uprising. Now it your job to stop the King in his trails, and redeem your name after years of exile.

NOTE: this a BETA build and  is nowhere near completed there is no story, and tons of content will be added in future updates.

Join the discord community here: https://discord.gg/kuWqexg
